item.title: CamemBERT 2.0: A Smarter French Language Model Aged to Perfection
item.description: CamemBERT 2.0: Two new French language models (CamemBERTav2 & CamemBERTv2) outperform predecessors by addressing temporal concept drift via larger, updated datasets and enhanced tokenization, demonstr…
